title: Alvin, EB4, Everything Bag Set, Mesh Pouches - 4 Pieces, Assorted Sizes
features: 4 PIECE SET - With varying sizes, this set of 3 pouches include Large 13 by 10 inches, Elongated 12.5 by 4.75 inches, Medium 10 by 8.25 inches, and Small 8 by 6 inches pouches.
ON-THE-GO USE - Conveniently store your tools, pencils, colored pens, and other materials in these handy mesh pouches! Ideal for professionals and students who are always out on field.
SECURED STORAGE - Made from high-quality mesh front with private zippered inside pouch, these handy pencil pouches keep your art tools and small documents safe and secured.
ECONOMICAL ALTERNATIVE - This 3-piece mesh pouch set is a cheaper alternative to the traditional pencil pouches or cases but has the same function and durability.
A PROFESSIONAL'S CHOICE - Alvin has been the professional's choice for drafting tools and drawing supplies for over half a century. Since 1950, we have brought quality and value to our customers.
description: Conveniently store your tools, pencils, colored pens, and other materials in these handy mesh pouches! Made from high-quality mesh front with private zippered inside pouch, these handy pencil pouches keep your art tools and small documents safe and secured. A cheaper alternative to the traditional pencil pouches or cases but has the same function and durability. Ideal for professionals and students who are always out on field. Available in 3 and 4 piece sets.
